<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns clouds occlusion between two given points (0 - no clouds, 1 - full clouds). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''simulCloudOcclusion''' [pos1,pos2] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1,pos2]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Position]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Position]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>canSeeSun = ('''simulCloudOcclusion''' == 0)</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setSimulWeatherLayers]], [[simulCloudDensity]], [[simulInClouds]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 8 August, 2014 - 12:17
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]
<dd class="note">The '''simulCloudOcclusion''' command is not recognized on dedicated servers, and will produce an error.  If you use this command, it '''cannot''' be anywhere within a script that is run on the dedicated server, or the entire script will halt.  To get around this, you can use: <code>if ![[isDedicated]] then {[] [[execVM]] "simulCloudOcclusionScript.sqf"};</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
